title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Replay "old" Spotlight Events
description:
In this video we will look at how you can replay the "old" spotlight events. Spotlight events are replaced on a regular base which results in sometimes a bit of frustration due to the fact you still wanted to improve your skills.
Using the steps in this video you are able to replay the "old" spotlight events again.

The content used in this video can be found on the following site:

https://forums.flightsimulator.com/t/release-replayable-live-events-landing-challenges-discovery-flights-iconic-flights/322267
